name: OnePlus Ace 6T
highlights:
Expected announcement 2025, November

Android 16, ColorOS 16
256GB/512GB/1TB storage, no card slot

BODY.Build: Glass front (Crystal Shield Glass), aluminum alloy frame, glass back or fiber-reinforced plastic back
BODY:
IP68/IP69K dust tight and water resistant (high pressure water jets; immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)
Micro-Arc Oxidation ceramic-like coating on the back

DISPLAY.Type: LTPO AMOLED, 1B colors, 165Hz, PWM, HDR10+, Dolby Vision, HDR Vivid

MAIN CAMERA.Dual:
50 MP, f/1.8, 24mm (wide), PDAF, OIS
8 MP, f/2.2, 16mm, 112˚ (ultrawide), 1/4.0", 1.12µm
MAIN CAMERA.Features: Color spectrum sensor, LED flash, HDR, panorama

COMMS.Bluetooth: 5.4, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, LHDC 5
COMMS.Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS (G1), BDS (B1I+B1c+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L5)

FEATURES.Sensors: Fingerprint (under display), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass
